lmgtfy.description: Let me google that for you :^)

iam.description: Give yourself a role that server admins have published.

purgeban.description: Bans a user and purges their messages over the last 7 days.

convert.description: Convert things to other things. Supports currency, mass, length, etc...

haveibeenpwned.description: Check if you have an account that has been compromised in a data breach. **Do not include any information you do not want other guild members to see**.

isspass.description: Tells you when the International Space Station (ISS) is going to pass over <location>.

fact.description: Get a random, somewhat interesting, possibly inaccurate fact.

base.description: Information about SpaceX and the cool shit they have.

launches.description: Gets information on past, present and future SpaceX launches.

needsmorejpeg.description: Fucks up your image with JPEG compression. There is no such thing as too much jpeg.

dashboard.description: Get a link to your servers dashboard.

create.description: Creates a playlist from the current queue.

delete.description: Delete one of your existing playlists.

addqueue.description: Adds the current queue to an existing playlist.

removetrack.description: Remove a track from your playlist.

stop.description: Stops the player and clears the queue, but doesn't leave the channel.

resume.description: Resumes the player if it is paused.

remove.description: Removes a song from the queue.

shift.description: Shift a song's position in the queue.

join.description: Make Atlas join your voice channel.

toggleplugin.description: Toggle a plugin on or off.

level.description: Gets your or another users level.

leaderboard.description: Gets the leaderboard link for Levels.

nodes.description: Gets information/statuses about available voice nodes.

channelspaces.description: Replaces hyphens in channel names with real fake spaces! Seriously though, this is more of a hack and could be patched at any time.

autoplay.description: Enable or disable autoplay. When enabled, once at the end of a queue, Atlas will automatically queue related songs.

locale.description: Changes what language Atlas uses in your server.

time.description: Obtém a hora para um fuso horário.

say.description: Faz Atlas dizer o que você quiser.

roleinfo.description: Obtém informações sobre um grupo do servidor.

id.description: Obtém o ID de um canal, grupo, usuário, servidor, etc...

quote.description: Cite uma mensagem de um usuário.

minecraft.description: Verifica o status de um servidor de Minecraft.

membercount.description: Mostra informações sobre a contagem de membros do servidor.

joined.description: Descobre quando um usuário entrou no servidor.

embed.description: Incorpora uma mensagem. Você pode usar o "advancedembed" para mais opções.

advancedembed.description: Incorpora uma mensagem com opções avançadas.

discrim.description: Gets users with a discriminator that matches yours.

user.description: Obtém o avatar de um usuário.

trump.description: Gets something stupid Donald Trump has said.

urban.description: Gets the definition for a word.

randomurban.description: Gets a random definition from Urban Dictionary.

gotcharacter.description: Obtém informações sobre um personagem de Game of Thrones. Execute sem args para obter um personagem aleatório.

gothouse.description: Obtém informações sobre uma casa de Game of Thrones. Execute sem args para obter uma casa aleatória.

action.description: Usado para habilitar ou desabilitar filtros e mudar suas ações.

list.description: Lista filtros e suas configurações atuais.

base.description: Controla onde determinadas mensagens são registradas em seu servidor.

actions.description: Define onde os registros de ação são registrados. Execute com nenhum args para resetar.

endswith.description: Purges messages that end with [term]. Supports wild*cards.

invites.description: Purges messages containing Discord server invite links.

includes.description: Purges messages that includes your term  Supports wild*cards.

not.description: Purges messages that do not include your term. Supports wild*cards.

startswith.description: Purges messages that start with your term. Supports wild*cards.

user.description: Purges messages that are from the user specified.

slowmode.description: Enables message rate limiting for the channel. Set to 0 or enter "disable" to disable slowmode entirely.

coinflip.description: Flips a coin that can land heads or tails.

move.description: Moves a message to another channel.

botinfo.description: Gets information about almost any public bot via discordbots.org.

xkcd.description: Gets a random (or not) XKCD comic.

leave.description: Leaves the voice channel and dumps the queue.

unban.description: Unban a user from the guild.

emojify.description: Converts regular sentences to awesome emojified sentences 🎉

mute.description: Stops a user sending messages while they're muted.

next.description: Goes to the next song in the queue.

show.description: Search for information about a TV Series.

weather.description: Get weather information from anywhere in the world.

catfact.description: Who doesn't like facts about cats?

cat.description: Kittens, cats, you name it - we've got it (maybe).

dog.description: Dogs. Just random pictures of dogs.

advice.description: Need quality life advice from a source you can trust? Then this isn't the command for you.

base.description: Manage warnings. Warn users for bad behaviour, edit previous warnings a user has and more.

add.description: Add a warning to a user.

funban.description: Bans a user but it's fun (and slightly spammy)

ban.description: Bans a user, exactly what it says on the tin.

submit.description: Submit suggestions to the suggestion channel.

patreon.description: Support Atlas on Patreon and get awesome perks!

help.description: View all of Atlas' commands or get help for a specific command or plugin.

yesno.description: Yes or no? Gets a random yes or no randomly.

ping.description: Check the time Atlas takes to reply to you!

support.description: Need help with Atlas? Join our Support server!

uptime.description: Check how long Atlas has been online for.

nowplaying.description: Shows information about the song currently playing.

play.description: Plays a song in your current voice channel, now with built in playlist support!

qplaylist.description: Adds songs from a YouTube playlist to the queue.

queue.description: Shows upcoming songs in the player queue.

trumpgen.description: Generate an image of Trump's twitter tweeting something.

remindme.description: Set reminders to get notified in the future.

captcha.description: Are you a robot? I know I am.

invite.description: Get Atlas in your own server by inviting me!

8ball.description: Ask the magic eight-ball a question.
